co.poynt.os.services.v1

Interface IPoyntScannerService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.os.IInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IPoyntScannerService.Stub

    public interface IPoyntScannerService
extends android.os.IInterface
    Provides the interfaces read barcode/qrcode etc from a scanner accessory device. This interface should be implemented by accessory apps as a service supporting barcode scanner to provide rest of the system an ability to read barcode from a scanner device.
    Since:
    1.0-beta2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPoyntScannerService.Stub
      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        void registerListener(String referenceId,
                      IPoyntScannerListener callback)
               throws android.os.RemoteException
        register a listener to get barcode from connected scanner. return the barcode via listener callback.
        Parameters:
        referenceId - will be passed as a part of listener.
        callback - IPoyntScannerListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
